statement.tex: \text{If the function $f:R \rightarrow R$ be defined by} \\ \text{$f(x)=2x-3$ and $g:R\rightarrow R$ by $g(x)=x^3+5$,} \\ \text{then find the value of $(fog)^{-1}(x)$}.

step.reason: f(x) = 2x-3 \\ g(x) = x^3+5 \\ fog(x)\text{ is shorthand for }f(g(x)) \\ \begin{align} f(x) &= 2x-3 \\ \therefore f(g(x)) &= 2(g(x))-3 \\ &= 2(x^3+5)-3 \\ &= 2x^3+10-3 \\ \implies fog(x) &= 2x^3+7 \end{align}
